name: enhanced HTML 5 video navigation
short_description: We introduce sample code for your own web development which gives you extended navigation facilities for the playback of HTML5 videos. Among the features are a list of scenes where you can click on a single scene to jump to a given location of the video. The currently played scene is highlighted and thus indicates the current position in the video. Other features are framewise step forward backward, start, end of video, fast forward, backwind.
summary: support for single frame step, a list of scenes and more
